Das AQQAsystem basiert auf der Idee des: The AQQAsystem is based on the idea of the AQQAbag. It turns surface water into hygienically safe water on a larger scale. It can be installed directly at a water source or a river course.

Im ersten Reinigungsschritt wird in modu: First, the water is purified by the membranes in modular boxes equipped with our filter plates. The membranes have a retention effect of 99.9999 percent for bacteria. It is filtered only with the lowest pressure. This allows the dirt to detach from the filter plate by gravity alone.
